languages.text: "Когда я ваяю скульптуры, Ваше Звездное Сиятельство, в них я вижу чужие судьбы. Видения, что приходят ко мне, придают форму не только камню, но судьбе человека. Ваш образ явился мне расплывчатым, работа еще не закончена. Что вы желаете в ней увидеть?"

"When I sculpt, Your Celestial Highness, I see people's destinies in the forms I create. The visions that come to me shape not only the stone, but the person's fate as well. Your image was indistinct when it appeared before me, and my work is not yet done. What do you wish to behold?"
languages.original_text: "Когда я ваяю скульптуры, Ваше Звездное Сиятельство, в них я вижу чужие судьбы. Видения, что приходят ко мне, придают форму не только камню, но судьбе человека. Ваш образ явился мне расплывчатым, работа еще не закончена. Что вы желаете в ней увидеть?"

traits.locale_text: "When I sculpt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I see people's destinies in the forms I create. The visions that come to me shape not only the stone, but the person's fate as well. Your image was indistinct when it appeared before me, and my work is not yet done. What do you wish to behold?"

"When I sculpt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I see people's destinies in the forms I create. The visions that come to me shape not only the stone, but the person's fate as well. Your image was indistinct when it appeared before me, and my work is not yet done. What do you wish to behold?"

"When I sculpt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I see people's destinies in the forms I create. The visions that come to me shape not only the stone, but the person's fate as well. Your image was indistinct when it appeared before me, and my work is not yet done. What do you wish to behold?"

"When I sculpt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I see people's destinies in the forms I create. The visions that come to me shape not only the stone, but the person's fate as well. Your image was indistinct when it appeared before me, and my work is not yet done. What do you wish to behold?"

"When I sculpt, Your Celestial Highness, I see people's destinies in the forms I create. The visions that come to me shape not only the stone, but the person's fate as well. Your image was indistinct when it appeared before me, and my work is not yet done. What do you wish to behold?"

"When I sculpt, Your Celestial Highness, I see people's destinies in the forms I create. The visions that come to me shape not only the stone, but the person's fate as well. Your image was indistinct when it appeared before me, and my work is not yet done. What do you wish to behold?"

languages.text: “当我雕刻的时候，大人，我会从我的造物中看到人们的命运。我眼前的幻景不仅塑造了这尊雕像，也同样塑造了那个人的命运。在我眼中，您的形象模糊不清，而我的工作尚未完成。您想看到什么？”
languages.original_text: "When I sculpt, Your Celestial Highness, I see people's destinies in the forms I create. The visions that come to me shape not only the stone, but the person's fate as well. Your image was indistinct when it appeared before me, and my work is not yet done. What do you wish to behold?"

traits.locale_text: “当我雕刻的时候，大人，我会从我的造物中看到人们的命运。我眼前的幻景不仅塑造了这尊雕像，也同样塑造了那个人的命运。在我眼中，您的形象模糊不清，而我的工作尚未完成。您想看到什么？”

languages.text: «Cuando esculpo, Excelencia Celestial, veo el destino de la gente en las formas que cincelo. Mis visiones no solo moldean la piedra, sino también el sino de la persona en cuestión. Su imagen estaba difusa cuando se apareció ante mí, y aún no he concluido mi obra. ¿Qué desea contemplar?».
languages.original_text: "When I sculpt, Your Celestial Highness, I see people's destinies in the forms I create. The visions that come to me shape not only the stone, but the person's fate as well. Your image was indistinct when it appeared before me, and my work is not yet done. What do you wish to behold?"

traits.locale_text: «Cuando esculpo, Excelencia Celestial, veo el destino de la gente en las formas que cincelo. Mis visiones no solo moldean la piedra, sino también el sino de la persona en cuestión. Su imagen estaba difusa cuando se apareció ante mí, y aún no he concluido mi obra. ¿Qué desea contemplar?».

languages.text: "Semavi Efendimiz, heykel yaparken yarattığım biçimlerde insanların kaderlerini görürüm. Bana gelen görüler sadece taşı değil, kişinin kaderini de şekillendirir. Görüntünüz önümde belirdiğinde belirsizdi. İşim henüz bitmedi. Neyi görmek istersiniz?"
languages.original_text: "When I sculpt, Your Celestial Highness, I see people's destinies in the forms I create. The visions that come to me shape not only the stone, but the person's fate as well. Your image was indistinct when it appeared before me, and my work is not yet done. What do you wish to behold?"

traits.locale_text: "Semavi Efendimiz, heykel yaparken yarattığım biçimlerde insanların kaderlerini görürüm. Bana gelen görüler sadece taşı değil, kişinin kaderini de şekillendirir. Görüntünüz önümde belirdiğinde belirsizdi. İşim henüz bitmedi. Neyi görmek istersiniz?"

languages.text: 「天の閣下、彫刻するとき、わしが作り出す形の中に人々の運命を見るのです。わしに降りてくるイメージは、石を形作るだけでなく、人の運命も形作ります。あなたのイメージがわしの前に現れたとき、それははっきりとしていませんでしたので、作品はまだ出来上がっていません。あなたは何を見たいですか？」
languages.original_text: "When I sculpt, Your Celestial Highness, I see people's destinies in the forms I create. The visions that come to me shape not only the stone, but the person's fate as well. Your image was indistinct when it appeared before me, and my work is not yet done. What do you wish to behold?"

traits.locale_text: 「天の閣下、彫刻するとき、わしが作り出す形の中に人々の運命を見るのです。わしに降りてくるイメージは、石を形作るだけでなく、人の運命も形作ります。あなたのイメージがわしの前に現れたとき、それははっきりとしていませんでしたので、作品はまだ出来上がっていません。あなたは何を見たいですか？」

languages.text: « Lorsque je sculpte, Votre Altesse Célestissime, je vois la destinée des gens dans les formes que je crée. Les visions qui me parviennent façonnent non seulement la pierre, mais aussi le destin de la personne concernée. Lorsqu'elle m'est parvenue, votre image était indistincte, c'est donc pour cela que mon œuvre n'est pas encore achevée. Que voulez-vous voir ? »
languages.original_text: "When I sculpt, Your Celestial Highness, I see people's destinies in the forms I create. The visions that come to me shape not only the stone, but the person's fate as well. Your image was indistinct when it appeared before me, and my work is not yet done. What do you wish to behold?"

traits.locale_text: « Lorsque je sculpte, Votre Altesse Célestissime, je vois la destinée des gens dans les formes que je crée. Les visions qui me parviennent façonnent non seulement la pierre, mais aussi le destin de la personne concernée. Lorsqu'elle m'est parvenue, votre image était indistincte, c'est donc pour cela que mon œuvre n'est pas encore achevée. Que voulez-vous voir ? »

languages.text: "Wenn ich etwas erschaffe, Eure himmlische Hoheit, dann sehe ich das Schicksal von Menschen in meinen Werken. Meine Visionen formen nicht nur den Stein, sondern auch das Schicksal des jeweiligen Menschen. Euer Bild war verschwommen, als es mir erschienen, und mein Werk ist noch nicht vollendet. Was wollt Ihr sehen?"
languages.original_text: "When I sculpt, Your Celestial Highness, I see people's destinies in the forms I create. The visions that come to me shape not only the stone, but the person's fate as well. Your image was indistinct when it appeared before me, and my work is not yet done. What do you wish to behold?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich etwas erschaffe, Eure himmlische Hoheit, dann sehe ich das Schicksal von Menschen in meinen Werken. Meine Visionen formen nicht nur den Stein, sondern auch das Schicksal des jeweiligen Menschen. Euer Bild war verschwommen, als es mir erschienen, und mein Werk ist noch nicht vollendet. Was wollt Ihr sehen?"
